steps.title: How to Redact Text in {{FileFormatCap}} Files

content.title: With {{ProdFullName}}, {{EnvName}} developers can remove sensitive content in just a few steps.
content.step_1: Create a {{textRedactor}} and load your {{FileFormatCap}} file.
content.step_2: Choose the redaction settings you want.
content.step_3: Enter the text to search for and its replacement.
content.step_4: Apply redaction and save the file.
